gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 126, Raptors 125
gameRecap.excerpt: Saddiq Bey throws down a putback dunk with 1.3 seconds remaining in regulation to lift the Hawks over the Raptors, 126-125. Bey recorded a season-high 26 points, along with 13 rebounds for the Hawks, while Trae Young added a game-high 30 points and 12 assists in the victory. Scottie Barnes tallied 24 points and eight assists for the Raptors in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 19-27 on the season, while the Raptors fall to 16-30.
